public interface RefTarget
Classes that implement this interface maintain a count of active references to each instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getRefCount()
    Count the active references to the target.
    void
    setEmbedded()
    Mark the target as embedded.
    Ref
    toRef()
    Create a counted reference to the target.

  • Method Details

    • getRefCount

      int getRefCount()
      Count the active references to the target.
      Returns:
      the count (≥0)

    • setEmbedded

      void setEmbedded()
      Mark the target as embedded.

    • toRef

      Ref toRef()
      Create a counted reference to the target.
      Returns:
      a new JVM object with a new native object assigned
